officialTitle: Effectiveness and Safety of Low-dose vs. High-dose Rosuvastatin on Long-term Cardiovascular Events in Korean Patients After Percutaneous Coronary Intervention: 30-month, Prospective, Single-center, Randomized Trial
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients underwent percutaneous coronary intervention with drug-eluting stent;
* Must have minimum age of 35 Years
